title: (x) Citibank Font "Let's get it done" campaign - Interstate {Rainer}
content:
Hi everyone,

Citibank has recently rolled out a new campaign with the slogan "Let's get it done". It seems like Citibank is also using a new font(?). It's not the OCRK Bold Square everyone was talking about. For example...

[http://www.citibank.com/us/d.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20110319155814/http:/www.citibank.com/us/d.htm "http://www.citibank.com/us/d.htm")  
The font of the words "Banking/Credit Cards/Lines & Loans/Investing/Planning" near the top.

OR

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RFOQrOd9E2g](http://web.archive.org/web/20110319155814/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=RFOQrOd9E2g "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RFOQrOd9E2g")  
The font at the end of the slogan "Let's get it done".

What is the font?

Thanks!!
author: ay88
